subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The Guhil-Sisodia dynasty was founded by
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश का निर्माण किया था?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal was the founder of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty.
explanation_hi: बप्पा रावल गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The Pratihar dynasty was founded by
question_hi: प्रतिहार वंश का निर्माण किया था?
explanation_en: Raja Nagabhata was the founder of the Pratihar dynasty.
explanation_hi: राजा नागभट्ट प्रतिहार वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The Chauhan dynasty was founded by
question_hi: चौहान वंश का निर्माण किया था?
explanation_en: Raja Vanraj Chauhan was the founder of the Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: राजा वनराज चौहान चौहान वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous queen of Mewar?
question_hi: मेवाड़ की प्रसिद्ध रानी कौन थी?
explanation_en: Rani Padmini was the famous queen of Mewar.
explanation_hi: रानी पद्मिनी मेवाड़ की प्रसिद्ध रानी थीं।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The famous temple of Chauhan dynasty is
question_hi: चौहान वंश का प्रसिद्ध मंदिर है?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Temple is the famous temple of Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: कुंभलगढ़ मंदिर चौहान वंश का प्रसिद्ध मंदिर है।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous king of Mewar?
question_hi: मेवाड़ का प्रसिद्ध राजा कौन था?
explanation_en: Raja Rana Kumbha was the famous king of Mewar.
explanation_hi: राजा राणा कुंभा मेवाड़ का प्रसिद्ध राजा था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The Chauhan dynasty was defeated by
question_hi: चौहान वंश को पराजित किया था?
explanation_en: The Chauhan dynasty was defeated by Khilji dynasty.
explanation_hi: चौहान वंश को खिलजी वंश ने पराजित किया था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The famous battle of Chauhan dynasty is
question_hi: चौहान वंश का प्रसिद्ध युद्ध है?
explanation_en: The Battle of Haldighati is the famous battle of Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: हल्दीघाटी का युद्ध चौहान वंश का प्रसिद्ध युद्ध है।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The Guhil-Sisodia dynasty was a part of
explanation_en: The Guhil-Sisodia dynasty was a part of Rajput Confederacy.
explanation_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश राजपूत संघ का हिस्सा था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The Pratihar dynasty was a part of
explanation_en: The Pratihar dynasty was a part of Rajput Confederacy.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार वंश राजपूत संघ का हिस्सा था।
